body:
The comment documents an empirical finding - I saw the implementation of diag_backward, thought "well, I can be smart about it and use diagonal rather than manually redoing the same thing" and it failed. I changed it to do the calculations here and it worked. I do not have a theory about why it happens. :neutral_face: I don't think it's using the op that is differentiated, but it is something subtle with the inplace operation.
This is also the reason why I think it is particularly important to check that it works in the tests.
